title: 2022 Week 9 Preview: Stop the Slide!
itunes:title: 2022 Week 9 Preview: Stop the Slide!
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, and Gregg Rosenthal preview all the games on the Week 9 slate with a couple of running themes: teams on a downward trend with a chance to stop the slide, and other teams with a good "measuring stick" kind of game. We start with the primetime games, Titans-Chiefs (3:16) and Ravens-Saints (12:18), before moving on to the draft: Rams-Buccaneers (17:50), Bills-Jets (26:03), Seahawks-Cardinals (34:34), Chargers-Falcons (40:22), Dolphins-Bears (46:04), Colts-Patriots (54:27), Panthers-Bengals (1:02:48), Packers-Lions (1:10:56), Vikings-Commanders (1:16:44), and finally, Raiders-Jaguars (1:22:21). Each of the heroes makes their lock-of-the-week pick, and we check in on the lock standings towards the end of the episode.

Note: timecodes approximate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
